item.description:
@toxiccorn wrote:

Its because you didnt change your Object IDâ€™s, Check ur spawn list (X, Y, ObjectID, Height, Type); make sure that your cases match the ObjectID that you typed in your spawning list.

item.title: Member portal error
item.dc:creator: @poopsicle100 poopsicle100
item.description:
@poopsicle100 wrote:

ok i put this in client.java and i thought it was right but it doesnt seem to work since the new portals just telle u to the same area as the member area portal

under this

makeGlobalObject(3098, 3505, 7319, 0, 10);//memberportal

i added this

makeGlobalObject(2332, 3171, 7319, 0, 10);//memberportal makeGlobalObject(2332, 3172, 7319, 0, 10);//memberportal makeGlobalObject(2332, 3173, 7319, 0, 10);//memberportal

then under this

case 7319: // memberportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 2340; teleportToY = 3170; sendMessage("you teleport to the members area."); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break;

i added this

case 7320: // wyvernportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 2792; teleportToY = 9333; sendMessage("you teleport to the wyvern! ahh watch out"); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break; case 7321: // dragpkportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 3202; teleportToY = 3856; sendMessage("you teleport to dragpk! beware of pkers"); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break; case 7322: // metaldragportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 2695; teleportToY = 9482; sendMessage("metal dragons! kill maybe ull get a visage"); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break; case 7323: // memtrainportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 2715; teleportToY = 9183; sendMessage("member training zone!"); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break;

NOTE:the memberportal works! its the others and they r in the member area so i dont want people saying o u need else if on memberportal cuz that doesnt matter that portal works fine

Read full topic
